channel.title: Oil on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Oil on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: US Taxpayers Will Pay Billions in New Fossil Fuel Subsidies Thanks to the Big Beautiful Bill
item.description: A report finds that President Trump’s flagship legislation will grant $40 billion in new subsidies to the oil and gas industry over the next decade.
